meanings.definition: Provide with a curtain or curtains.
meanings.sent1: She curtained the window to block out the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The room was curtained with beautiful drapes.
meanings.sent3: He curtained the stage with a giant sheet, creating a mysterious effect.
meanings.sent4: Her smile curtained her true feelings of sadness.
meanings.sent5: The magician curtained off the area before performing his trick.

meanings.definition: Conceal or screen with a curtain.
meanings.sent1: The criminal curtained his face to avoid being recognized.
meanings.sent2: The garden was curtained by the tall bushes.
meanings.sent3: She curtained her surprise with a fake yawn.
meanings.sent4: The fog curtained the city in a blanket of mist.
meanings.sent5: The mystery novel curtained the identity of the killer until the last chapter.
